L

Level - Class in model
A class to hold anything that all Levels have in common This includes: The Game board values Score milestones (1/2/3 stars) Number of special moves As well as some common behavior associated with these attributes
Level(LevelState) - Constructor for class model.Level
Construct a new level
LevelState - Class in model
 
LevelState(String, int[][], int[][], int[][], boolean[][], int, int, String, int[], int[], int, int, int[], int[], boolean, int) - Constructor for class model.LevelState
Creates a LevelState object with the given parameters
LevelState() - Constructor for class model.LevelState
Creates a default LevelState object
LevelState(String) - Constructor for class model.LevelState
Creates a LevelState using the name of an existing LevelState save file
LevelView - Class in view
This is the View the player sees whaen playing the game It contains a top bar that is different depending on the level type It contains the board, with an active controller bound to it that is used to make moves It also contains a GameWestPanel with the progress bar, score milestones, and a restart button
LevelView(PuzzleLevel, Level, Application) - Constructor for class view.LevelView
Construct a new LevelView for a PuzzleLevel, as well as the next level that will be unlocked The only difference between constructors is which Top Panel is used
LevelView(EliminationLevel, Level, Application) - Constructor for class view.LevelView
Construct a new LevelView for a EliminationLevel, as well as the next level that will be unlocked The only difference between constructors is which Top Panel is used
LevelView(LightningLevel, Level, Application) - Constructor for class view.LevelView
Construct a new LevelView for a LightningLevel, as well as the next level that will be unlocked The only difference between constructors is which Top Panel is used
LevelView(ReleaseLevel, Level, Application) - Constructor for class view.LevelView
Construct a new LevelView for a ReleaseLevel, as well as the next level that will be unlocked The only difference between constructors is which Top Panel is used
LightningCountdownController - Class in controller
In a lightning level, this controller is run by the timer each second It decrements the time remaining, and checks if you are out of time When you are out of time, it ends the level
LightningCountdownController(LightningLevel, LevelView) - Constructor for class controller.LightningCountdownController
make a new LightningCountdownController
LightningLevel - Class in model
 
LightningLevel() - Constructor for class model.LightningLevel
 
LightningLevel(LevelState) - Constructor for class model.LightningLevel
 
LightningTimer - Class in model
 
LightningTimer() - Constructor for class model.LightningTimer
 
LightningTimerTask - Class in model
 
LightningTimerTask(LightningLevel, LevelView) - Constructor for class model.LightningTimerTask
 
LightningTopBarPanel - Class in view
Each Level type needs to display different information in the top bar Lightning levels need to show the time left and count down each second
LightningTopBarPanel(LightningLevel, LevelView, Application) - Constructor for class view.LightningTopBarPanel
Construct a new LightningTopBarPanel for the given LightningLevel, its associated view, and the Application frame containing it
LoadedAchievement - Class in model
An achievement for loading the game.
LoadedAchievement() - Constructor for class model.LoadedAchievement
 
loadSave() - Static method in class controller.AchievementFileController
 
loadState(String) - Method in class model.LevelState
Loads a LevelState object from [fileName].sav in the levels directory
